resources.string: The Bagong Adventure Museum Tubuh adalah museum tubuh manusia pertama di Indonesia dan terbesar di Asia saat ini. Museum Tubuh berlokasi satu area dengan Jawa Timur Park 1 di Jl. Kartika No. 2 Kota Wisata Batu. The Bagong Adventure Museum Tubuh merupakan tempat wisata edukasi yang menampilkan anatomi tubuh manusia. Berdiri di atas lahan 1 hektar, museum berbentuk relief tubuh manusia dengan karakter Bagong, yang terdiri dari 6 lantai. Pembelajaran anatomi tubuh manusia di Museum Tubuh The Bagong Adventute ini dilengkapi dengan fasilitas multimedia yang modern guna mendukung zona di dalamnya. Mulai dari zona gigi, zona telinga, zona hidung, zona otak, zona mata, zona pembuluh darah, zona jantung, dan masih banyak zona lainnya. Pengunjung Museum Tubuh bisa mendapatkan check up secara gratis dengan tenaga medis di ruang pemeriksaan yang ada di dalam Museum Tubuh. Pemeriksaan gratis yang akan didapatkan pengunjung antara lain pemeriksaan mata, cek lemak tubuh, cek osteoporosis, cek kolesterol, cek asam urat, dan cek gula darah. Semua ini bisa didapatkan gratis bagi pengunjung museum tubuh. Jam Buka Museum Tubuh: 08.30-16.30 WIB Harga Tiket Masuk Weekday : Rp. 49.000 Weekend : Rp. 70.000
Bagus dan menarik, jadi ingin kembali lagi terimakasih jp
Good, cocok untuk quality time with friends, family, and partner :)
Happy time thankyou so much jatimpark

Hall of Fame : Medical science is developed in the present day canâ€™t be separated from the hands of experts. Get to know the medical scientists who are expert in the field of medicine at Hall Of Fame in The Bagong Adventure Human Body Museum
Let\'s get into the real version of our body! Through Bagong mouth as the entrance gate, you will start you adventure to learn about your own body anatomy!

How is the shape of human brain in big giant version? Or what is the shape of the human body when it is cut horizontally, or how does the human anatomy form seen from its blood vessels? Do not forget to visit Bagong Science Center if you want to know the answers

Being heal and healthy is important for us. In The Bagong Adventure Human Body Museum, you can have the medical check-up start from eyes to blood pressure for free. So, don\'t forget to visit The Bagong Adventure Human Body Museum, to learn and care about your health

Do you know what makes The Bagong Adventure Human Body Museum special and different? Yup, in the museum, there will be 5 Cadavers waiting on you! Cadaver itself is a real human body that already preserved. So, you\'ll be able to learn about the detail of the parts of your bodies. Then, don\'t worry about a thing! You\'ll be accompanied by guides who will explain your curiousity about Cadaver. Visit The Bagong Adventure Human Body Museum and know the answers about your body.
Terdapat beberapa wahana zona tubuh di Bagong Adventure, antara lain yaitu Heart zone, Brain zone, Nose Zone, dll
